tool.name: Make Source
tool.help:
Make Source ============
This Galaxy tool uses a compound name and an InChI string to construct a CSV file that can be used as the source input file for RetroPath2.0. "Source" refers to the target compound desired to be synthesised.
Input ^^^^^
Required Information:
* Compound name: (default: target) Name of the target molecule. Example: cis,cis-muconate * Compound InChI: (default: InChI=1S/C6H6O4/c7-5(8)3-1-2-4-6(9)10/h1-4H,(H,7,8)(H,9,10)/p-2/b3-1-,4-2-) Target molecule InChI struture.
Output ^^^^^^
* Source: CSV file input for RetroPath2.0
